TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Assassin. You must try again.
You have defeated the Assassin. When all three are gone you should return to Patch in Hyaan.
You have spotted one of the Imperial Assassins.
Patch rewards you handsomely once again.
You must find and defeat three Assassins that are looking for Patch.
You must return to Patch and give him the good news.
